{{cpp/identifier with special meaning/title|{{tt|final}} {{mark since c++11}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===用法===
* {{ltt|cpp/language/final}} 说明符

===示例===
{{source|
struct b0 final {};
struct d0: b0 {}; // 错误：不能从 final 基类派生

struct b1
{
    virtual void f0() final;
    virtual void f1();
};

struct d1: b1 // OK
{
    void f0(); // 错误：不能覆盖 final 函数
    void f1(); // OK
};
}}
